name: Panna Cotta
imgAlt: Italian cream dessert with berry sauce
instructions: Sprinkle gelatin over cold water and let bloom for 5 minutes.
Heat cream and sugar in saucepan until sugar dissolves (do not boil).
Remove from heat and stir in vanilla and bloomed gelatin.
Refrigerate for at least 4 hours until set.
Serve with fresh berries or berry sauce.
